meanings.sent1: She looked the glammiest at the party with her sparkly dress.
meanings.sent2: The actress wore the glammiest outfit on the red carpet.
meanings.sent3: Even in pajamas, she managed to be the glammiest person in the room.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the glammiest accessory she wore that night.
meanings.sent5: The chandelier cast the glammiest light on the dance floor.

meanings.sent1: The glammiest car at the show was a sleek black sports car.
meanings.sent2: Among all the decorations, the glammiest one was the crystal chandelier.
meanings.sent3: The cat strutted around like it was the glammiest creature in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in the glammiest shades of pink and gold.
meanings.sent5: Her voice was the glammiest sound he had ever heard.
